org.sakaiproject.email.api

Interface ContentType


  • public interface ContentType
    Common content types (primary/subtype) sent with message for use by client handling. Used when sending email messages. The most commonly used are:

    TEXT_PLAIN - for plain, unformated text only. Also consider PlainTextFormat when using this.
    TEXT_HTML - for html formatted text

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String TEXT_HTML
      Html formatted message
      static String TEXT_PLAIN
      Plain message with no formatting
      static String TEXT_RICH
      Richtext formatted message
